name: iw4x with log server
author: dominique@wellisch-itservice.de
startup: ./iw4m-log-server -p {{SERVER_PORT}} && wine iw4x.exe -dedicated -stdout +set net_port {{SERVER_PORT}} +exec server.cfg  +set fs_game {{MOD}} +party_enable 0 +sv_maxclients 20 +map_rotate && ./alterware-launcher --bonus --update iw4x

installation.script:
echo "Install IW4x debian linux" 

dpkg --add-architecture i386
apt-get update -y
apt-get install wine wine32 unzip git screen mono-devel curl wget -y

echo "### Downloading MW2 ###"
export HOME=/mnt/server
wget -P /mnt/server/ ${SERVER_DOWNLOAD}
cd /mnt/server && unzip -o iw4x.zip
echo "### Dowloading Server CFGs ###"
cd /mnt/server && git clone https://git.alterware.dev/AlterWare/IW4ServerConfigsLinux.git
cd /mnt/server && mv IW4ServerConfigsLinux/* .
cd /mnt/server && rm -R IW4ServerConfigsLinux
echo "### NEW: Downloading Alterware launcher ###"
cd /mnt/server && curl https://api.github.com/repos/iw4x/launcher/releases/latest | grep "browser_download_url.*x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz" | cut -d : -f 2,3 | tr -d \" | wget -qi -
alterware=$(find alterware-launcher*)
cd /mnt/server && tar -xvf ${alterware}
cd /mnt/server && rm ${alterware}
cd /mnt/server && chmod 755 alterware-launcher
echo "Downloading IW4M Logserver"
cd /mnt/server && curl https://api.github.com/repos/Stefanuk12/iw4m-log-server/releases/latest | grep "browser_download_url.*x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu.tar.gz" | cut -d : -f 2,3 | tr -d \" | wget -qi -
logserver=$(find iw4m-log-server*)
cd /mnt/server && tar -xvf ${logserver}
cd /mnt/server && rm ${logserver}
cd /mnt/server && chmod 755 iw4m-log-server
echo "### NEW: Running Alterware launcher to update files ###"
cd /mnt/server
./alterware-launcher --update --bonus iw4x
